<cs> my lords i am very glad to have this opportunity of expressing my support for the case put forward by the noble lord lord seebohm namely the setting up of this world commodities centre in london <e> <s> we are indebted to the noble lord lord seebohm for raising this subject in this house and i think i can safely say that the whole house is also indebted to the noble lord lord shackelton for taking part <e> <s> we always give great weight to his remarks and i am sure that the government will take very seriously what he has said <e>
